mapper.sql: id, name, reportid, directoryid, type, description, url, creater, created, modifier, modified
mapper.insert: insert into bo_info (name, reportid, directoryid , type,description, url, creater, modifier) values (#{name}, #{reportid}, #{directoryid}, #{type},#{description}, #{url}, #{creater}, #{modifier})
mapper.select: select distinct i.id, i.name, i.reportid, i.directoryid, i.type,i.description, i.url from bo_info i,bo_acc_info ai where i.reportid=ai.reportid and ai.accountid in (select distinct r.accountid from bo_accad_relation r where r.empnum=#{empnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select count(1) from bo_info where reportid = #{reportid}

select distinct i.id, i.name, i.reportid, i.directoryid, i.type,i.description from bo_info i,bo_acc_info ai where i.reportid=ai.reportid and ai.accountid in (select distinct r.accountid from bo_role_account r where r.rid = #{rid, jdbcType=INTEGER})
